sourcesContent:
import { Fragment, useContext } from "react" import { Outlet, Link } from "react-router-dom" import './navigation.styles.scss' import { UserContext } from "../../context/user.context" import {ReactComponent as CrownLogo} from '../../assets/crown.svg' import CartIcon from "../../components/cart-icon/cart-icon.component" import { signOutUser } from "../../utils/firebase/firebase.utils" const Navigation = () => { const {currentUser} = useContext(UserContext) return(
SHOP {currentUser ? SIGN OUT : SIGN IN }
) } export default Navigation
